text: Go to the Dreamscape Sales store

title: Mission Description
content: Though the way you entered the dream was less than desirable,SundayandRobinmade sure you received the utmost care... Fine. That was what they should have done anyway.Having refreshed your spirits, you andMarch 7threceived a message recommending you head to the Dreamscape Sales Store... Perhaps you can consider this the first stop on your wondrous dream journey.

speaker: (Trailblazer)
line: ▶ (The Dreamscape Sales Store... Should I visit it?)

speaker: (Trailblazer)
line: ▶ (This place is bustling. There are so many people living in the dreamscape...)

speaker: (Trailblazer)
line: ▶ (Wait, did that billboard just move!?)

speaker: (Trailblazer)
line: ▶ (According to the map, that is the Dreamscape Sales Store... Is that... a giant eyeball?)

speaker: Dr. Edward
line: Trailblazers from the Astral Express — Welcome to Dreamscape Sales Store!

children.speaker: Dr. Edward
children.line: It's me, the Dreamscape Sales Store. I also go by the name of Dr. Edward, and I'm happy to be at your service!

text: How do you know who I am?

children.speaker: Dr. Edward
children.line: ▶ It's the magic of psychoanalysis, ( sir / madam ) . Dr. Edward is happy to assist you!

speaker: Dr. Edward
line: Here's where you get to experience all sorts of fascinating dreamscapes — from the top-notch productions of Clock Studios to private donations, we have it all!

speaker: Dr. Edward
line: If I'm not mistaken, this is your first visit to Penacony, isn't it?

children.speaker: Dr. Edward
children.line: It is!

speaker: Dr. Edward
line: Please be rest assured that Dr. Edward will provide the best service you can find in helping you purchase your first Dreamscape and indulge in an exclusive and marvelous dreamland journey...

speaker: Dr. Edward
line: ...And that's the end of my analysis! I'm sure you'll be a fan of this dream bubble.

speaker: Dr. Edward
line: It's a contribution from an anonymous donor and is said to contain the memory of the fallen Aeon , Akivili ! I can assure you that this dream bubble is perfect for you!

text: How do you know what I want?

children.speaker: Dr. Edward
children.line: ▶ It's the magic of psychoanalysis, ( sir / madam ) !

text: Is this the memory of Akivili?

children.speaker: Dr. Edward
children.line: Dr. Edward does not make any guarantees regarding the authenticity of dream bubble content. Dreams are just dreams, so enjoy them!

text: How many credits do I have to pay?

children.speaker: Dr. Edward
children.line: None! Dr. Edward promises to let every new customer enjoy their first dream bubble for free.

speaker: Dr. Edward
line: Well, let's begin. Please close your eyes and rest your forehead against the dream bubble.

speaker: Pom-Pom
line: ...Trailblazer from the Astral Express, do you plead guilty?

speaker: Dr. Edward
line: (I won't make any explanatory or leading comments on the content of this dream bubble. In the dream bubble, you'll be living through another person's past memories — you will experience what the original owner of the memory once experienced.)

speaker: Dr. Edward
line: (If any details are missing from the dream bubble, your subconscious will make up for it by substituting the missing content with something similar.)

speaker: Pom-Pom
line: The sins you've committed are beyond pardon, but I respect every individual's right to carry out volunteer work...

speaker: Pom-Pom
line: ...Give this place a thorough cleaning!

speaker: Akivili?
line: ...I'm listening.

text: Why isn't there any sound now?
Do I have to do the voiceover for Akivili myself?

speaker: Dr. Edward
line: (My apologies. When I received this dream bubble, some of the audio tracks were missing... Perhaps, even the memoria is unable to transmit the voice of Akivili.)

speaker: Dr. Edward
line: (However, I can make some adjustments to the dream bubble to improve your experience, meaning you can choose anyone's voice for Akivili's. As long as it's a voice you're familiar with, I'll be able to replicate it in your subconscious!)

children.speaker: Dr. Edward
children.line: (Well, it must be someone you're close to, unless you're willing to accept a very unpleasant listening experience.)

text: Does it have to be the voice of someone I'm close to?

children.speaker: Dr. Edward
children.line: (Yes, unless you're willing to accept a very unpleasant listening experience.)

children.speaker: Dr. Edward
children.line: ▶ (The subconscious has vast potential, ( sir / madam ) !)

speaker: Dr. Edward
line: (Well, please make a decision! I'll do my best to fulfill your needs.)

children.speaker: Dr. Edward
children.line: (Splendid! I'm rendering it as we speak...)

children.speaker: Dr. Edward
children.line: (Splendid! I'm rendering it as we speak...)

children.speaker: Dr. Edward
children.line: (Splendid! I'm rendering it as we speak...)

children.speaker: Dr. Edward
children.line: (Splendid! I'm rendering it as we speak...)

children.speaker: Dr. Edward
children.line: (Splendid! I'm rendering it as we speak...)

children.speaker: Dr. Edward
children.line: (What an odd request... but no matter! Dr. Edward will make it happen!)

children.text: Myself in a different gender, of course!

children.speaker: Dr. Edward
children.line: (Your voice in a different gender? That's slightly challenging... but no matter! Dr. Edward will make it happen!)

speaker: Dr. Edward
line: (...The replication is complete! Now, you can enjoy an enhanced Dreamscape experience.)

speaker: Pom-Pom
line: Do you, as well as the other passengers, take responsibility for the following malicious conduct?

speaker: Pom-Pom
line: You rode snowmobiles into the Taikiyan Stadium and disrupted the match, causing the match to be suspended. Because of you, Twenty Trailblazers were forced to repair the severely damaged exterior of the stadium for three months without pay...

speaker: Pom-Pom
line: ▶ ...Do you plead guilty to this ( accusation accusation Text for March 7th / charge charge Text for other voices )?

speaker: Akivili?
line: ▶ ▶ ▶ ▶ ▶ ▶ ...Yes, I plead guilty.

speaker: Pom-Pom
line: You sneaked into the Hyai'i Zoo and splurged half an Amber Era 's crew budget on 250 Nosewalker cubs. You kept them in the restroom, where they were left to breed and multiply uncontrollably, causing other carriages to be filled with sewage...

speaker: Pom-Pom
line: ▶ ...Do you plead guilty to this ( accusation accusation Text for March 7th / charge charge Text for other voices )?

speaker: Akivili?
line: ▶ ▶ ▶ ▶ ▶ ▶ ...Yes, I plead guilty.

speaker: Pom-Pom
line: You barged into the kitchen of the dining carriage, claiming that the whole area needed disinfection. This resulted in the loss of 42 Crispy Crumbly Pom-Pom Pies. And because you also took the last serving of the Express Special in the fridge, I was left starving...

speaker: Pom-Pom
line: ...Do you plead guilty to this charge?

speaker: Akivili?
line: ▶ ▶ ▶ ▶ ▶ ▶ The first one is clearly a result of your own doing... But I do admit to consuming the last serving of the Express Special.

speaker: Pom-Pom
line: Ahem. Don't get carried away just yet. This is only the beginning of your list of culinary offenses!

speaker: Pom-Pom
line: There are cases of entire entries disappearing from the Express data bank, the plants in the Parlor Car being watered with SoulGlad , disrupting the conductor's rest with noise, and a break-in to the conductor's exclusive snack vault.

text: What do all these have to do with Akivili?

children.speaker: Dr. Edward
children.line: (Let me reiterate that I won't make any explanatory or leading comments on the content of this dream bubble.)

text: This trailblazing expedition of yours is indeed an "Elating" one...

children.speaker: Dr. Edward
children.line: (Perhaps it is, but I won't make any explanatory or leading comments on the content of this dream bubble.)

text: Did SoulGlad really exist in that era?

children.speaker: Dr. Edward
children.line: (My apologies. By order of the Alfalfa Family , delicious, thirst-quenching SoulGlad is the only brand of beverage permitted to appear in recorded dreamscapes.)

speaker: Pom-Pom
line: And that's not even half the list! There are a total of 46 cases of malicious conduct! Do you admit to being the culprit in every case?

speaker: Akivili?
line: ▶ ▶ ▶ ▶ ▶ ▶ Sorry... I am indeed the worst Nameless in the universe.

speaker: Pom-Pom
line: ...No, you are not.

speaker: Akivili?
line: ▶ ▶ ▶ ▶ ▶ ▶ Could there be anyone worse than me?

speaker: Pom-Pom
line: Of course there is.

speaker: Pom-Pom
line: That guy who blew up the train into two pieces. [ Note 1 ]

speaker: Dr. Edward
line: ...That's all for the content of this dream bubble. How was your experience?

text: What do all these have to do with Akivili?

speaker: Dr. Edward
line: Haha, this dream bubble aligns with what you desire in your subconscious! If you're interested in experiencing the dream bubble again, you can purchase it with credits...

text: I almost expected something like this...
So that "first dream bubble for free" was just a sales pitch, huh?

speaker: Dr. Edward
line: This dream bubble is indeed pricey. Still, please give it some consideration!

speaker: Dr. Edward
line: Well, are you going to buy it?

children.speaker: Dr. Edward
children.line: Thank you. Hope to see you next time!

children.speaker: Dr. Edward
children.line: What a shame. Please come again!

speaker: Dr. Edward
line: Oh, right! As this is your first time using the dream bubble, here's a sticker for you! You can use it to decorate your Dreamscape Pass and commemorate your unique trip to Penacony!

title: Step Description
content: Under the guidance of Dr. Edward, you were able to experience the most famous audiovisual feast Penacony had to offer — a dream bubble — A virtual-reality device created for the dream world that was more realistic than a purely technological product. You played the role of someone you suspected to be an Aeon named Akivili (or someone), who ended up in a dispute with Pom-Pom, finally earning the title of "Second-most terrible Nameless in the World."It seems that there are many enjoyable experiences like these awaiting you in Penacony. Perhaps you should explore around for yourself.

speaker: (Trailblazer)
line: ▶ (I was hoping I would find some clues about the Nameless up here... Well, can't expect it to be that easy...)
She went that way. Get her!

speaker: (Trailblazer)
line: ▶ (What's going on? What's all the commotion about?)

text: Investigate the source of the disturbance

title: Step Description
content: As you wander around the Oti Mall, you hear a disturbance coming from the direction of the station.Go and check it out. The Nameless love getting involved in other people's business... No, more like you love helping people, after all!

line: Don't even think about running away, you stowaway!
S—Sorry for bothering you! Please, I need your help...

text: I'll do my best to protect a pretty young lady!

line: Hey, look! She has an accomplice!
Good work! Now we can nab them both in one go!

title: Step Description
content: As you head to investigate the source of the disturbance, you discover a silver-haired young girl being chased and surrounded.Can you turn a blind eye, or not? You decide to take up your bat and head into battle. You will teach these thugs a thing or two about how to behave.

text: Dreamjolt Troupe's Bubble Hound ×2 Dreamjolt Troupe's Mr. Domescreen ×1

line: That's enough, boys.
S—Sir?
What's gotten into you all? Open your eyes and take a good look. Is this lady the stowaway we're looking for?
Eh? Who... Who's this?
Don't you know him? Look at his brown hair and gray vest. He's the officer sent here by The Family to maintain order at the Charmony Festival .
I—I see... Sir, the thing is, we're trying to apprehend a stowaway, and that young lady there looks very suspicious. We're sure she's the one!

That's nonsense. Take another look, will you? The witness report says that the suspect is a lad with silver hair, and you guys are going after a girl with silver hair. Does that even make sense? She's our guest!
Well, just get out of my way and I'll take care of this.
Yes, sir!
Sorry for all the trouble you went through back there.

speaker: Gallagher
line: I'm Gallagher from the Bloodhound Family , and those idiots are some young Bloodhounds I've been training.

speaker: Gallagher
line: Because of their youth and inexperience, they mistook an honored guest of Penacony for a criminal... This is indeed a regrettable mistake. I'd like to offer my sincerest apology to you on behalf of the Bloodhound Family.

speaker: Gallagher
line: The Bloodhound Family are the guards of the Dreamscape. We're in charge of the security here, and our duties include arresting people who try to enter our world illegally.

speaker: Gallagher
line: We got a tip that some criminals were planning to take advantage of the festivities around the Charmony Festival to sneak into Penacony. Now that the festival is just around the corner, there are likely many shady characters lurking around...

speaker: Gallagher
line: Don't worry. I believe this is just a misunderstanding. How could such a lovely girl like you be a stowaway?
...Thanks. Without your kind help, I wouldn't know what to do.

speaker: Gallagher
line: Just part of the job.

speaker: Gallagher
line: I need to get going. If you need help, you can reach out to me through the young Bloodhounds in this area. I wish you an enjoyable experience in this land of dreams.
I owe you a big one! If it hadn't been for you, I might have been... taken away by them.

children.line: Thank you so much!

text: Well, my help doesn't come free...

children.line: I... I understand. It's only right to return the favors I receive!
You're funny.

line: By the way, I've just noticed... You're a Nameless, right? Is this your first time here on Penacony?

children.line: You have the Astral Express badge on you. I saw it on the big screen once!
I also know that you guys often travel around different places in the cosmos. Did The Family invite you here? I—I'd be happy to show you around!

text: Are the Nameless really that famous?

children.line: You bet! The Interastral Peace Broadcast recently did a whole segment about your glorious achievements!
I also know that you guys often travel around different places in the cosmos. Did The Family invite you here? I—I'd be happy to show you around!
That's not what I meant. Though I do admire the Nameless...
The Family invited you here, right? I—I'd be happy to show you around!

speaker: Firefly
line: Although the Bloodhounds mistook me for a stowaway, I'm actually a local. My name is Firefly , and I'm from the Iris Family . I work as a stage performer, although right now I'm just an extra...

speaker: Firefly
line: When there are no acting gigs, I work as a guide near Glaux Avenue. If you don't mind, I can show you all the exciting things around here! Maybe if I do my job as a guide, people will stop suspecting me...

text: That's awesome! I happen to need a tour guide.

children.speaker: Firefly
children.line: Glad to hear that. After all, you just did me a huge favor!

children.speaker: Firefly
children.line: I'm not booked for any performances, and most visitors to Penacony don't need tour guides anyway... They're all big shots who have their own entourage with them.

children.text: Well, you have a job now.

children.speaker: Firefly
children.line: Thanks. Let's go!

children.text: Looks like life on the Planet of Festivities can be pretty tough...

children.speaker: Firefly
children.line: No, it's not like that! Penacony is where people realize their dreams. There's always a festive atmosphere here! It's just that things can get a little crazy with the Charmony Festival drawing near...

children.text: I'm counting on you for a good tour then.

children.speaker: Firefly
children.line: Glad to hear that. After all, you just did me a huge favor!

children.speaker: Firefly
children.line: Me? No, I'm not one of them — not yet. I merely work for them...

children.text: You notice her lowering her lashes and looking around, paying close attention to the crowd, as if something is hiding in it. But she quickly collects herself and returns her eyes to you.

children.speaker: Firefly
children.line: ...We can talk about that another time! Right now, I wanna give you a tour of the town... Here we go!
